page.title: 14QUESTIONAIRE - RESULTS 2
page.content:
{SECTION 2 : EMPLOYMENT {**********************
1.Parents in full time employment ? { Husband 97.5% Wife 42.5% 2.Parents in part time employment ? { Husband 2.5% Wife 37.5%} 3 Parents unemployed ? { Husband 0% Wife 20% 4.How does the husband travel to work? { Car 92.5% Bus 2.5% Walk 5% Other 0 5.How does the wife travel to work? { Car 67% Bus 3% Walk 28% Other 3% 6.Where does the husband work ? { Crawshawbooth 15% Rossendale 40% { Burnley 10% Bury/Manchester 15% { Other 20% 7.Where does the wife work ? { Crawshawbooth 22% Rossendale 47% { Burnley 9% Bury/Manchester 6% { Other 9%}
